section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:AbstractBullet
Class to hold information that the other bullets share Animation
Class to handle (almost) all in-game animations Background
Holds all backgrounds and methods to fill each level with content Boss
The boss entity you fight at the end of the level loop BossBullet
The missile that the boss shoots Character
Abstract class to hold information that both player and enemy use CharacterBullet
The bullet used by the player and enemies Enemy
Enemy in the game. These use a recolored player bullet Entity
Abstract class for all entities in the game Game
The main game and all related classes eventually end up being used here. Game loop is in here and is the 'heart' of the whole program GUI
Contains all GUI used in the game, including all text. These are simple but can take a lot of space due to how much there is. Different GUIs are split into different render functions HMSection
The height meter and related methods Obstacle
Still obstacles that spawn across the levels ObstacleBulletPlayer
The player character, also contains plane controls Wall
Class for the normal walls (stone brick) ZapWall
Class for other walls (blue lightning) ZaxxonText
Class to grab text sprites from spritesheet given char or string
